aboutyou.easy

aboutyou.easy¶

Author:Arne Simon [arne.simon@slice-dice.de]

EasyAboutYou is the attempt to make aboutyou a little bit more userfriendly and hides much of the direct calls to the aboutyou API.

Class Structures¶

class aboutyou.easy.Basket(easy, sessionid)¶

Bases: object

Parameters:
  • easy – The EasyAboutYou instance.
  • sessionid – The session id the basket is associated with.

keys()¶
order(success_url, cancel_url=None, error_url=None)¶

Begins to order this basket.

Parameters:
  • sucess_url (str) – this is a callback url if the order was successfully created.
  • cancel_url (str) – this is a callback url if the order was canceled.
  • error_url (str) – this is a callback url if the order throwed exceptions.
Returns:

The url to the shop.

class aboutyou.easy.EasyAboutYou(config)¶

Bases: object

An abstraction layer around the thin aboutyou api.

Parameters:config – A aboutyou.Config instance.
autocomplete(searchword, types=None, limit=None)¶

Autocompletes the searchword and looks in the products and/or categories for autocompletion possebilities.

Parameters:
  • searchword (str) – The abbriviation.
  • types (list) – against which types should be autocompleted. The oprions are aboutyou.Constants.TYPES
  • limit (int) – the amount of items returned per selected type
Returns:

A tuple of two list. First one are the products and the second are the categories.

Example

>>> products, categories = easy.autocomplete("sho")

Returns the category with the given id.

Parameters:cid – The id of the category to get.

categoryByName(name)¶

Returns the category with the given name.

Note

If there are more than one category with the same name. The last inserted category will be returned.

Parameters:name (str) – The name of the category.
Returns:A aboutyou.easy.Category instance.

getSimpleColors()¶

Returns an array of facet colors which are a simple selection out of the hugh possebilities.

productsByEAN(eans)¶

Gets products by its ean code.

Parameters:ean (int) – Product ean.
Returns:A aboutyou.easy.Product instance.
productsById(pids)¶

Gets a products by its id.

Note

If not all products where found an exception is thrown, which contains a list of all found and all not found products.

Parameters:pids (list) – A list of product ids.
Returns:A list of aboutyou.easy.Product instance.
Throws:aboutyou.easy.SearchException

Example

try:
    for p in easy.productsById([237188, 237116]):
        print p.name
except SearchException as e:
    print e.withError   # list of tuples (id, [errors]) for not found products
    print e.found       # list of found products
search(sessionid, filter=None, result=None)¶

Creates a new aboutyou.easy.Search instance.

Note

See aboutyou.aboutyou.productsearch().

Parameters:sessionid – The user session id.
Returns:A aboutyou.easy.Search instance.
suggest(searchword, categories=None, limit=None)¶

Suggest additional words to the provided searchword.

Parameters:
  • searchword (str) – A search string to suggest items for.
  • categories (list) – A list of aboutyou.easy.Category.
  • limit (int) – The maximum amount of results.
Returns:

A list of strings.
